SpotDetail.sql: SELECT spot.*, country.RegionCnName as CountryName, city.RegionCnName as CityName FROM traveldb.tab_travelspots spot LEFT JOIN traveldb.tab_travelregion country ON ( spot.countryID = country.regionid) LEFT JOIN traveldb.tab_travelregion city ON( spot.cityID = city.regionid ) WHERE spotsID = ?

SpotPics.sql: SELECT PicURL FROM traveldb.tab_travelspotsdetail WHERE spotsID = ?

SpotLabels.sql: SELECT label.ClassifyLabel FROM traveldb.tab_travelspotslabel spotlabel LEFT JOIN traveldb.tab_classifylabel label on ( spotlabel.classifylabelid = label.classifylabelid ) WHERE spotsID = ?;
